tool_description: Selects optimal audience segments for marketing campaigns based on profile characteristics, campaign objectives, and targeting constraints.

audience_profiles.description: Array of audience profile data from profile builder

campaign_objective.description: Campaign goal: awareness, conversion, retention, or engagement

budget_allocation.description: Total campaign budget in currency units

geographic_constraints.description: Geographic targeting constraints as region codes

exclusion_criteria.description: Audience segments or characteristics to exclude

optimization_metric.description: Optimization target: ctr, cpm, cpc, or roas

error_messages: Invalid audience profiles: Provide valid audience profile data with required fields.
Unsupported campaign objective: Use one of [awareness, conversion, retention, engagement].
Invalid budget allocation: Provide a positive budget value greater than 0.
Target audience size out of range: Set target_audience_size between 1000 and 10000000.
Invalid optimization metric: Use one of [ctr, cpm, cpc, roas].
usage: Provide audience_profiles, campaign_objective, and budget_allocation; optionally set target_audience_size, geographic_constraints, demographic_filters, exclusion_criteria, and optimization_metric. Returns optimized targeting parameters.

selected_segments.description: Array of selected audience segments for targeting

estimated_reach.description: Estimated audience reach for selected segments

budget_distribution.description: Array showing budget allocation across segments
